This chunk appears within a document explaining the fundamentals of texturing in Panda3D, starting with basic concepts and transitioning to more complex topics. It confirms that Panda supports various image formats like JPG, PNG, and TIF, then lists detailed sections covering advanced techniques such as texture wrapping, filtering, multi-texturing, environment mapping, animations, transparency, management, compression, and creation.

Panda can load JPG, PNG, TIF, and a number of other file formats.
